definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The studio is currently directed by Prof. Sun Weimin .
sentences.chinese: 现任画室主任为孙为民教授。

sentences.english: I decided to take a walk down Crosby to visit my favorite store Atelier.
sentences.chinese: 我决定采取往下走克罗斯访问我最喜爱的商店画室。

sentences.english: Please sit for me in the studio, "he pleaded, and l will immortalize your beauty."
sentences.chinese: 到我的画室里去坐着，好吗？我要为你画张像。

sentences.english: Delacroix created his painting in a magnificent studio.
sentences.chinese: 德拉克洛瓦是在一间装修华丽的画室里完成的他的画。

sentences.english: Lady Catherine's drawing rooms costs eight hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 甚至凯瑟琳夫人一个画室的壁炉架就价值八百英镑。

sentences.english: The principle instructors at The Atelier are Dale Redpath and Cyd Wicker.
sentences.chinese: 在这个原则的画室老师是戴尔雷德帕斯和何秀兰柳条。

sentences.english: The picture gallery, and two or three of the principal bedrooms, were all that remained to be shewn.
sentences.chinese: 剩下来只有画室和两三间主要的寝室要指给他们看了。

sentences.english: Show studio will sell to love China, yao Ming that help show your find new homes.
sentences.chinese: 秀卿将画室卖予爱华，耀明即帮秀卿找到新居。

sentences.english: The studio is currently directed by Prof. Dai Shihe.
sentences.chinese: 现任画室主任为戴士和教授。

sentences.english: The stupid student rapidly studied the car air conditioningcident in the studio.
sentences.chinese: 拙笨的学生在画室里快捷研究了事故。

sentences.english: The stupid student  rapidly studied the accident in the  studio.
sentences.chinese: 愚蠢的学生在画室里快速研究了事故。

sentences.english: The studio is currently directed by Prof Xie Dongming.
sentences.chinese: 现任画室主任为谢东明副教授。

sentences.english: We do not get the leisure to view thoroughly this studio within us.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有空闲去详查我们内心的画室。

sentences.english: In Arles, Van Gogh found the perfect premises for this studio of the south.
sentences.chinese: 梵高在亚尔找到设立南方画室的理想地点。

sentences.english: This was the studio where Feng Zikai drew his caricatures.
sentences.chinese: 这里就是丰子恺先生当年的画室。

sentences.english: Also through reading your book I've learnt things they never tell you about aftercare in the Studio.
sentences.chinese: 书中还通过阅读我学到的东西，没告诉你善后的画室。

definition: to sketch from nature/to do a still life drawing
